exam.question: It’s a pleasure for him to ______ his energy and even his life to research work.

answer.explain: dedicate to： 将…奉献于…。句意： 对他来说， 把精力甚至生命奉献给研究工作是一种乐趣。dictate： 口述， 口令； deco-rate： 装饰； direct： 直接的。

exam.question: We should ______ our energy and youth to the development of our country.

answer.explain: 句意： 我们应该把自己的力量与青春奉献给祖国的建设事业。cater： 满足， 投合； ascribe： 归因于； cling： 黏着， 附着。

sentences.sContent: She dedicated her first album to Woody Allen, who she says understands her obsession.
sentences.sCn: 她把她的第一张唱片献给伍迪·艾伦，她说艾伦理解她的痴迷。

sentences.sContent: ...we will dedicate little effort to real-world bonding...
...We do not doubt that teachers who also coach face serious tradeoffs that likely come at the expense of time they could dedicate to their academic obligations...

remMethod.val: de(表加强) ＋ dic(宣称) ＋ ate(做) → 宣誓为祖国献身

words.tran: 以…奉献；把…用于（dedicate的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 题献词于上； 把献给， 把用于
trans.tranOther: to give all your attention and effort to one particular thing
